item.title: Two Papers Accepted by the ic2s2 Conference
item.description: Two papers coauthored by the lab members have been accepted by the 4th Annual International Conference on Computational Social Science (ic2s2) to be presented as a Poster, July 12â€“15, 2018. Evanston, Illinois, United States.
